title: Action Research-Based Elementary Science Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A course focused on developing practical instructional design competencies applicable to classroom settings, targeting current elementary school teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can compare various instructional design models and select one suitable for the characteristics of elementary science curricula.
Learners perform design tasks reflecting real classroom situations and apply action research methodologies.
Learners strengthen their instructional design problem-solving capabilities through collaboration with peer teachers and experts from other institutions.
Learners can complete the design of instructional materials and activities that effectively deliver science curriculum content.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
